name: Insects Are Everywhere
lyric:
Insects are everywhere
Just look and see
Underneath the rocks
Climbing up the trees
Just look in your garden
Or in your front yard
You should really have to look very hard
Lady bugs grasshopper bumble bees
Out of long branches munching up some leaves
Beetles crickets sting bugs too
Leaf hopper zarmy are just a name of few
There are millions of ants
And they're hard at work
Digging their tunnels under the earth
Looking for a picnic or just a bit of food
Or just a few crumbs left over from you
Oh when they find it they think it's really great
One little ant can carry twice his weight
Bring the food back to the colony
Where all those ants have just one queen
Caterpillar slowly inching by
One day she hopes to be a butterfly
When she finds a spot with just enough groom
She goes to work on her cocoon
Caterpillar sleeping dreaming now
On about flowers and flying around
Out of the chrysalis ready to fly
That's how caterpillars become butterflies
Insects are everywhere
Just look and see
Underneath the rocks
Climbing up the trees
Look in your garden
Or in your front yard
You should really have to look very hard
